data.question: What is the purpose of heating a solution of Fe(N2)(PMe3) and diphenylacetylene at 85 °C for 24 hours?
data.answer: The purpose is to induce a reaction between Fe(N2)(PMe3) and diphenylacetylene, leading to the formation of new products.

data.question: True or False: The reaction between Fe(N2)(PMe3) and diphenylacetylene results in a single product.
What technique is used to monitor the reaction between Fe(N2)(PMe3) and diphenylacetylene?
What is the role of B(Ph)3 in the reaction involving Fe(N2)(PMe3) and diphenylacetylene?
data.answer: B(Ph)3 is added to abstract the PMe3 moiety, facilitating the conversion of the reaction mixture to 2-N2.

data.question: True or False: The reaction of Fe(N2)(PMe3) with diphenylacetylene at 85 °C for 24 hours yields a mixture of 2-N2 and 2-PMe3.
What is the yield percentage of the synthesis of 7-Ph,Ph from 2-N2 and diphenylacetylene?
True or False: The synthesis of 7-Me,Ph from 2-N2 and 1-phenyl-1-propyne requires heating at 95 °C.
What is the analytical technique used to confirm the structure of the synthesized compounds?
What is the effect of adding PMe3 to the reaction of Fe(N2)(NCtBu) at room temperature?
data.answer: The addition of PMe3 leads to the formation of Fe(N2)(PMe3) by replacing the NCtBu ligand.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of Fe(N2)(PMe3) from Fe(N2)(NCtBu) and PMe3 results in a 100% yield.
What is the magnetic moment (µeff) of the compound FeCl synthesized from PC(sp3)HP Li(THF) and FeCl2(PMe3)2?
True or False: The synthesis of FeMe from FeCl and MeLi involves heating at -78 °C.
What is the purpose of recrystallizing synthesized compounds from a concentrated solution of THF layered with n-pentane?
data.answer: The purpose is to purify the compounds and obtain analytically pure crystals suitable for structural analysis.

data.question: True or False: The compound 2-N2 is synthesized by heating Fe(N2)(PMe3) with diphenylacetylene and then adding B(Ph)3.
What is the chemical shift (δ) of the carbene carbon in the 13C NMR spectrum of Fe(N2)(PMe3)?
True or False: The compound 7-Ph,Ph is synthesized directly from Fe(N2)(PMe3) without any intermediate steps.
What is the role of heating the reaction mixture of 2-N2 and diphenylacetylene at 105 °C for 48 hours?
data.answer: Heating facilitates the reaction between 2-N2 and diphenylacetylene, leading to the formation of 7-Ph,Ph.

data.question: True or False: The compound 7-Me,Ph is synthesized by reacting 2-N2 with 1-phenyl-1-propyne at 95 °C.
What is the yield percentage of the synthesis of 7-Me,Ph from 2-N2 and 1-phenyl-1-propyne?
True or False: The compound Fe(N2)(NCtBu) is synthesized by reacting FeMe with NCtBu at room temperature.
